name: The Necromancer of North Oaks
text: Deep within the oak forest lies an ancient source of evil.

name: Doom Under Sightrock
text: A grim and hopeless despair permeates the lush fields and streams in the shadow of Sightrock.

name: Sunriders
text: The people of the steppes are a powerful ally in the fight against the Empire.

name: Gravewood
text: Fiercely independent and secretive, the woodsfolk are sparing with their trust.

name: Into the Cold
text: Eastkeep is the safest entry point to the Empire.

name: Ballad of Eight Ears
text: The cursed hermit known as Eight Ears guards the dark hollows of Gray Forest.

name: Burgan Vale
text: The people of Burgan Vale treat the Veil - the energies which bind the land the people together - as the centerpiece for every aspect of life.

name: Sowing Rebellion
text: The breadbasket of the Empire, the people of Guilder Farms are not content.

name: Tragedy and Conspiracy
text: Imperials have fanned the flames of conspiracy against Red Bank in the wake of a terrible tragedy.

name: Summit at Lily Manor
text: A gathering of cultures, Imperials work to spread distrust against Red Bank.

name: Crescent Hold
taskd: Mission Path: Reward: +1 Crescent Hold Alliance Track
costa: Mission Path: Reward: +1 Crescent Hold Alliance Track
costb: Season End: Unlock Lily Manor (Mission, Alliance). Unlock Aren's Forge (Mission, Quest).

name: Pelakhar's Loyalty
taskd: Mission Path: Seriously? A Dragon? Reward: Unlock Pelakhar Artifact.

name: Lily Manor
taskd: Mission Path: Reward: +1 Lily Manor Alliance Track.
costa: Mission Path: Reward: +1 Lily Manor Alliance Track.
costb: Season End: Unlock Viator (Charaacter), Unlock Sapphire Djinn (Mission, Quest).

name: Dusk's Ayrie
titlea: Combat, Lore, Burgan Vale, Sorcery, Conquest

name: Southkeep
costb: Season End: Unlock Firstborn Peak (Mission, Quest).

name: The Council
costb: Season End: Unlock The Sundering (Mission, Quest).

name: The Sundering
costb: Season End: Unlock The Animaelic Forest (Mission, Quest).

name: Animaelic Forest
taska: Special: Each timer drawn adds +2 discord.
titleb: Special: If discord overflows in the animaelic forest, a character in the group is killed, lost in the maelstrom.
taskb: Special: If a character is knocked out, they are removed from play.
costb: Season End: If this is the sixth year, Red Bank has fallen. You have lost.
